name: HardPixel
description:
- THE GAME IS IN DEVELOPPEMENT -

Galactic war in 8bit with several game mode ! :D

_______________Sorry for my spelling mistakes (i'm French :D)_______

HardPixel is a 2D game created in 2 days by N O V A with Unity3D. Hardpixel is surely one of the hardest games in the world !
